channel.title: 2 things how do i get a santa? and how do i change the xp and levels
channel.description: ok how do i get a santa clause and i wanna change the xp and levels so its harder to get them up and need codes!!!

item.title: 2 things how do i get a santa? and how do i change the xp and levels
item.dc:creator: @KingTasty KingTasty
item.description:
@KingTasty wrote:

The id for santa is: 1552 if you want to spawn him just put this in your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 1552	****	****	0	0	0	0	0	0	Santa

fill in the stars with the x and y coords where you want him at
as for the xp and levels I think there is a tut on it so lemme check quick

Read full topic
item.source: 2 things how do i get a santa? and how do i change the xp and levels
